thread.title: Scott, Denver, CO
thread.title_full: Rentalcars.com reviewed by Scott, Denver, CO

author: Scott, Denver, CO
title: Scott, Denver, CO
text: They were great; when we booked online, we couldn't believe the price. Thought there might be hidden fees (mileage, gas, etc.) but nope, the price Quote: d was the price we paid! They did take a $200 deposit up front, but refunded it back within 3 days of dropping the car off. Will definitely use them every time we fly into Ontario (or any other airport that they serve!)
